title: Mirror of Germany. No. 296 = Deutschland Spiegel

description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of magazine films depicting various aspects of life in West Germany. Looks at a workshop in Germany which manufactures propellers for giant tankers and container ships,Neuschwanstein Castle, West Berlin, gypsy jazz with the Hans che Weiss quintet, graduates from Germany and the developing countries study production methods and the use of machines in the tropics, and a soccer match in Hamburg.
